name: Queerskins: A love story
storyline: Take an emotional journey down a country road in rural Missouri along with Ed and Mary-Helen, Sebastian's parents. Uncover Sebastian's life as you interact with his belongings found in the box next to you. Was he a "disgrace" like his father says or a "good man" as his mother believes?
summary: Queerskins: a love story is a 6DoF interactive virtual reality experience. In this emotionally-charged experience, you are seated in the back seat of a photo-realistic 1986 Cadillac, behind Sebastian's parents, as they take a journey down a country road in rural Missouri. Get to know Sebastian through the drama unfolding in intimate proximity in the front seat as well as by interacting with a collection of Sebastian's personal belongings including his diary. Was he a "disgrace" like his father says or a "good man" as his mother believes?
